text: Ana nen mbe nzuav, bigɨna mueŋ vhunama sav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Guma the fhum fhava shaa kama the rɨzgiap, anan fɨga thueŋ ndiga vov fhava shaa vura thooŋ phorga samgi fhu. Ana maaŋ muuŋgirga, ana mba fhava shaar kam, ana ana farfagirga. Ana vhɨra mba fhava shaa fɨga kamen mba fhava shaa vura thooŋ phorga samgim, anan gangan harigi khesharigi. Mani mba gangana bavira mbui fhuvara.
